title: Add new transloco scope module, along with translation files.

name.x-prompt: What scope name would you like?

module.description: The path at which module to add scope to, relative to the workspace root.

inlineLoader.description: Should create scope with inline loader.

translationPath.description: The to the translation files, relative to the project's root.

path.description: The path at which to create the NgModule, relative to the project's root.

routing.description: When true, creates a routing module.

routingScope.description: The scope for the new routing module.

flat.description: When true, creates the new files at the top level of the current project root.

commonModule.description: When true, the new NgModule imports "CommonModule".

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the module.
